org.openscience.cdk.io

Class ZMatrixReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.io.ChemObjectIO
      • org.openscience.cdk.io.DefaultChemObjectReader
        • org.openscience.cdk.io.ZMatrixReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, IChemObjectIO, IChemObjectReader, ISimpleChemObjectReader

    @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.io.ZMatrixReaderTest")
public class ZMatrixReader
extends DefaultChemObjectReader
    It reads Z matrices like in Gaussian input files. It seems that it cannot handle Z matrices where values are given via a stringID for which the value is given later.
    Keywords:
    file format, Z-matrix
    Belongs to CDK module:
    extra
    Source code:
    master
